PROGRAMMING EXPERIENCE

-- Application featuring trivia questions built using HTML, CSS, JS, Jquery, and AJAX. Features dynamic integrated API and Star Wars Themed styling.

-- A full-stack application featuring a collection of Men’s Tweed suits from various different brands. Built using EJS, Jquery, JS, CSS, HTML, MongoDB, NodeJS (bcrypt, method-override, mongoose, express, etc.).



Disqover

-- A full-stack CRUD application designed by a small team of 3 individuals that allows the user to search for music or movies using an integrated API choosing various returned data entries that they like to add to their personal collection. Built using AngularJS, MongoDB, NodeJS, HTML, CSS, jQuery with additional frameworks (bcrypt, express, express-session, mongoose, etc.).



Gameplayce

-- A full-stack CRUD application designed by myself and another individual that simply allows a user to post reviews for games that are searchable through an external API via a search bar. Each review contains the users name, the game they are reviewing, and the review itself. Built using ReactJS, Postgresql, Ruby, and Rails.



Wed-ly

-- An application built to exercise having self-taught a new language or framework without instructional oversight from an expert. The application features a simplistic checklist for a couple planning a wedding and can add and delete tasks on the checklist. Built using the self-taught framework of VueJS in the MEVN Stack (Mongo, Express, VueJS, and NodeJS)



Open System Projects

-- Ambitious website and service that seeks to allow users to create custom commercial or industry based projects and garner support for their projects from the community at large. Currently under development.



Project Azure

-- Daily Life Planner and Organizer application under development by myself primarily and a few other developers to create a unique application which aims to serve those who are disabled or have disabilities. The application incorporates most features likely not found on other applications and combines areas of life such as health, faith, finance, daily living, and even diet and nutrition, shopping, etc. Built using React Frontend and Python/Django Backend. Currently under development.
